channel.title: MULTI-ACTIVITY TOURS OF NORTHEASTERN INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Travels in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in MULTI-ACTIVITY TOURS OF NORTHEASTERN INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Travels in Northeast India

item.title: ASSAM: Tea, Wildlife & Culture in the Brahmaputra Valley | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Up close and personal in the Brahmaputra Valley This multi-activity tour of Assam takes us to the Brahmaputra valley.

item.title: MEGHALAYA: Hike, Bike & Culture in the abode of clouds | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Hike and bike in Abode of Clouds This particular Multi-activity tour of Meghalaya takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Hike, Bike, Raft & Culture in India's far east | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Hike, Bike and Raft in India’s far east This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River.

item.title: ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Hike and Bike in the Monyul region | Multi-Activity Tour
item.description: Active & Interactive in the High Himalayas This particular trek is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt.
